CompanyFullInfoApiModel.description: API model that wraps the eInforma full company profile response.

fiscalAddress.description: Aggregates all company fiscal address related fields.

latitude.description: Geocoordinate component latitude (Lat) of the company ubication.

longitude.description: Geocoordinate component longitude (Long/Ln) of the company ubication.

nif.description: The company NIF. They call it CIF, however this terminology is deprecated nowadays in Spain.

organizationName.description:
This field represents what in spanish is known as the "Denominacin Social" 
ex: "Contasimple S.L"

remainingRequests.description: Remaining company requests counter. eInforma limit is set to 500 different company requests/month per Contasimple companyId.

CompanyLatestChangesApiModel.description:
API model that wraps the eInforma API response with the company latest changes, plus the URLs 
to the sample and full reports for the end-user to buy.

executiveSummaryReportFull.description: URL link pointing to the 'Resumen ejecutivo' full report, with no data displayed and the 'Purchase' button.

executiveSummaryReportSample.description:
URL link pointing to the 'Resumen ejecutivo' sample report 
with all fields visible, but with fictional company data.

latestChangesReportFull.description: URL link pointing to the 'Informe Financiero' full report, with no data displayed and the 'Purchase' button.

latestChangesReportSample.description:
URL link pointing to the 'Informe Financiero' with the latest company changes sample report,
with all fields visible, but with fictional company data.

organizationName.description:
This field represents what in spanish is known as the "Denominacin Social" 
ex: "Contasimple S.L"

otherReports.description: URL link pointing to a company summary with all available reports to purchase.

DeliveryNoteApiModel.description: Contains the information for a delivery note

entityString.description: The name that represents the issuer or target entity of the delivery note

id.description: The identifier of the delivery note

issueDate.description: Contains delivery note issue date (could be null)

issuer.description: The entity issuer. The one who generated the delivery note.

lastUpdateDate.description: The last time the delivery note was updated

lines.description: The line objects for the delivery note

numberingFormatId.description: If not NULL contains the identifier of the selected numbering format.

originalIssuerEntityID.description: Original ID of the issuer of the delivery note

originalTargetEntityID.description: Original ID of the target of the delivery note

relatedEstimateId.description: The identifier of the estimate related to the delivery note (if exists)

status.description: The current status of the delivery note

target.description: The entity target. The receiver of the delivery note.

totalAmount.description:
Gets the total final amount for the delivery note (the value returned includes the 
addition of the taxable amount plus the VAT amount for every line) less the
retention amount. TotalAmount = BI +IVA - Retencion + R.E

totalReAmount.description: The total RE amount of the delivery note

totalTaxableAmount.description:
Gets the total taxable amount for the delivery note (the value returned includes the 
addition of the taxable amounts for the several lines). (Spain: Base imponible)

totalVatAmount.description:
Gets the total VAT amount for the delivery note (the value returned includes the 
addition of the VAT amounts for the several lines).

DeliveryNoteIdentifiersListApiModel.description: The list of delivery note identifier

DeliveryNoteLineApiModel.description: Defines the information for a delivery note line

detailedDescription.description: A detailed description for the delivery note line

discountPercentage.description: The discount percentage to apply to the delivery note line

id.description: The identifier of the delivery note line

productId.description: The selected product associated to the line for stock control

productName.description: The selected product name associated to the line for stock control

productSku.description: The selected product sku associated to the line for stock control

totalTaxableAmount.description: The TotalTaxableAmount of the delivery note line

unitTaxableAmount.description:
Gets or Sets the unit price (the price for a single unit of product) for the delivery note line. 
The total taxable amount for the line will be UnitTaxableAmount * Quantity.

vatAmount.description: Gets or Sets the total VAT amount for the delivery note line.

vatPercentage.description:
Gets or Sets the VAT percentage of a single unit of product. If the TotalVATAmount property is set it takes precedence over 
this property and the value returned is computed from the TotalVATAmount and UnitTaxableAmount properties.

post.description:
Provides authentication services for the API.

The supported grant types are:

signup: Used for creating new users (this type requires to provide the 'username' and 'password' arguments). To accept an invitation to a company from the user creation, the 'invitation_id' and 'invitation_token' arguments are required).
password: Used for authentication (this type requires to provide the 'username' and 'password' arguments).
facebook: Used for authentication with a Facebook token (this type requires to provide the 'token' argument).
google: Used for authentication with a Google token (this type requires to provide the 'token' argument).
apple: Used for authentication with a Apple JWT (this type requires to provide the 'token' argument).
refresh_token: Used for getting a new access token (this type requires to provide the 'refresh_token' argument).
impersonate: Used for changing the current user (this type requires to provide the 'user' and 'refresh_token' arguments).
change_company: Used for changing the current company (this type requires to provide the 'company' and 'refresh_token' arguments).
authentication_key: Used for accessing a user account without providing username and password (this type requires to provide the 'key' argument). This grant type appends on the API response a client_id and client_secret.
autologin_token: Used for accessing a user account without providing username and password (this type requires to provide the 'token' argument).
